attributes.action: make available, and transparent, additional funding to MyChoiceHomebuy scheme
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This scheme to allow keyworkers to purchase their home has run out of funding, meaning hundreds of applicants have been left stranded. Many have begun the process only to be told funds allocated have been withdrawn, meaning sales have fallen through. This has left both buyers and vendors in untenable positions. Please sign to ask for additinal funding to be made on this scheme.

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
